name: Vagrant (HikaruDaisuke, MrJeff07)
description:
Vagrant is pixel art-top down adventure game, where your decisions shape the outcome of your adventure. You'll have to search your enviroment, speak with others and learn about the place you are now. As you quest, you'll start to learn about the importance of knowing the place where you at and how the harder choices are sometimes the right ones.

Developed by Armaggedon Games.
